title: Card Cover
desc:
Post 2360
- Cover a card, giving it the **Hidden** attribute to a card and turning it into a <:colorless:1106434944261177374> card.
 - When played, this card can be revealed by any other player, but its effects will only affect the player who played this card.
 - If this card is an effectless card, when revealed, you gain 2 **Card Shards** ðŸ”¹.
